summary: The diff shows implementation of REQ-4 (updating frontend components to use new image paths) but provides no evidence of REQ-1, REQ-2, and REQ-3 (actual image generation). The components now reference the correct paths for hero background, category preview images, and fallback images, but the actual image assets are not present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a new hero section background image with an elegant Indian ethnic fashion theme featuring rich colors and traditional textile patterns
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows the HeroSection component updated to reference '/assets/generated/hero-background.dim_1920x1080.png', but no evidence of the actual image file being generated or added to the project

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate attractive category preview images for Sarees, Western Dresses, Lehenga, and Jewellery sections on the home page
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows Home.tsx referencing category image paths (category-sarees.dim_400x300.png, category-western-dresses.dim_400x300.png, category-lehenga.dim_400x300.png, category-jewellery.dim_400x300.png), but no evidence of the actual image files being generated or added

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate fallback product images for each category (Sarees, Western Dresses, Lehenga, Jewellery) to replace the current placeholder images
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows ProductCard component updated with categoryFallbackImages mapping to '/assets/generated/fallback-*.png' paths, but no evidence of the actual fallback image files being generated or added
